name: Island Defender
description:
Island Defenders TD for GBJAM 5

Build Towers to defend your island from being invaded by pirates! Arrr!

Controls:

Move the Cursor with arrows.

Build Towers with C and A at cursor position.

Note: sadly not finished, but gave my best :(

The HTML 5 is broken, so I got only the WIndows build at the moment... meh
